nodes.name: getItem

params._newAdmin: address of account to be added as administrator

addItem(bytes32,string,string,uint256,st.details: only callable by store owners, requires parent store to be active, throws on duplicate item ID per store

addStore(string,string).details: only callable by store owners, throws on duplicate store ID per store owner

params._newStoreOwner: address of account to be added as shopowner

changePrice(bytes32,bytes32,uint256).return: true on success, false on failure

getItem(address,bytes32,bytes32).return: name of itemdescription of itemipfs hash of imageprice of itemavailable quantity of itemindex of item in item id listbool flag whether item is active

getItemIdList(address,bytes32).return: bytes32 array, containing item IDs of a store belonging to store owner

getStore(address,bytes32).return: name of storedescription of storebytes32 array of item IDs belongig to storeindex of store in store id listbool flag whether store is active

getStoreIdList(address).return: bytes32 array, containing IDs of stores belonging to store owner

purchase(address,bytes32,bytes32).return: true on successful purchase, false on failure

params._admin: address of account to be removed as administrator

removeItem(bytes32,bytes32).details: only callable by store owners, requires item to be active

params._itemID: ID of item to be removed

removeItem(bytes32,bytes32).return: true on success, false on failure

removeStore(bytes32).details: only callable by store owners, requires store to be active

params._storeID: ID of store to be removed

removeStore(bytes32).return: true on success, false on failure

params._storeOwner: address of account to be removed as shopowner

restock(bytes32,bytes32,uint256).return: true on success, false on failure

params._storeOwner: address of store owner to be featured

withdraw().return: true on success, false on failure

addItem(bytes32,string,string,uint256,st.notice: add an item to a store

flipEmergencySwitch().notice: flips the emergency switch, only callable by owner

getItem(address,bytes32,bytes32).notice: return item of a store belonging to a store owner

getItemIdList(address,bytes32).notice: return item list of store belonging to a store owner

getStore(address,bytes32).notice: return store by store ID belonging to a store owner

getStoreIdList(address).notice: return list of stores belonging to a store owner

setFeaturedStoreOwner(uint256,address).notice: lets owner set a featured store owner
